titleStmt.title: A great over-throw: giuen [sic] to Sir Ralph Hopton's whole army by Sir William Waller neere Farnham, with onely sixe troope of horse, and some foote, the rest of his army being stated in severall quarters in other places. With many remarkable passages, which deserue [sic] euerlasting [sic] memory.

A great over-throw: giuen [sic] to Sir Ralph Hopton's whole army by Sir William Waller neere Farnham, with onely sixe troope of horse, and some foote, the rest of his army being stated in severall quarters in other places. With many remarkable passages, which deserue [sic] euerlasting [sic] memory.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Hammon, this is licensed and entred in Stationers Hall, according to order.,
